Control.ttp: esThis page is used for maintaining information related to 'Internet Settings'.

Control.lbl: esBypass proxy server for local addresses:
Control.ttp: esSynchronize the date and time on the device with the date and time on my computer.
esChecked indicates that Proxy is enabled on this device.
esClick to display online help related to this page...
esClick to open the print dialog for sending the contents of this page to the default printer...

Messages.Message: es'Internet Proxy Host' minimum length is 4.
es'Internet Proxy Host' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
es'Internet Proxy Port' minimum length is 2.
es'Internet Proxy Port' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
